result.execSummary:
The defendant Stevie D Walls was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Stevie D Walls is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Stevie D Walls was found guilty of Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Defendant, Stevie D Walls with Attorney T. Gregory Amann appeared.  Prosecuting attorney Andrea Amidon Nodolf.  Hanna Neuberg - Clerk 9:01 am

DE - pleads no contest to 15CF15 Ct 3 
DE - pleads no contest to 15CF263 Ct 1 Misdemeanor Bail Jumping
DE - waiver of rights & JT in both files 15CF15 & 15CF263

State - Orally amend 15CF263 to Misdemeanor Bail Jumping -  Dismiss Ct 1, Ct 2, Ct 4 in 15CF263 - Dismiss 14CM375  - Victim Rights have been complied with in 14CM375 - Many victims in 15CF15 - w/held sent 2 years probation - 60 days jail - court costs on both misdemeanor files- AODA and follow though


COURT - finds waiver voluntary - finds suff. facts - finds DE guilty in 15CF15 Ct 3 and 15CF263 Ct 1 to Orally amended Misdemeanor Bail Jumping
w/held sent. 2 years probation concurrent to each count
60 days jail condition of probation - Start Jail no later than Feb 1, 2017
